meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Neven Gerry Sullivan Dale Ragus Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1167.

td.p: Tom Neven, an editor from Wayne, New Jersey
Gerry Sullivan, a teacher from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts
Dale Ragus, a real estate broker from New York City, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $28,002)

tr.td: OHIO
THE BIBLE
MEN'S FASHION
MUSEUMS
ELVIS FILMS
ENDS IN "ITZ"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Tom: What is chocolate?)

cheese

DaleTom
')

Gerry

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Gerry] No, Utah is a state.)
(Gerry: Oh.)
[Laughter]
DaleWhat is J?
$300
GerryWhat is U?
$5,499
TomWhat is Q?
$5,101
Q')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'It\'s the only letter not used in the spelling of the 50 states')

tr.td: U.S. STATES
It's the only letter not used in the spelling of the 50 states
Dale
Gerry
Tom
3rd place: The Motion Picture Guide 12-volume collection from Cinebooks+ either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! scorekeeper
2nd place: Profile vertical blinds + Joan Roulet 18K gold clock + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! scorekeeper
New champion: $12,601 + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! scorekeeper
Dale
Gerry
Tom

9 R,
4 W

15 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
